message: I propose dividing the money with a ratio of 3:1 in favor of Alice. This is a fair split considering the diminishing value of money in subsequent rounds.
I propose a 60/40 split in my favor. While I acknowledge the potential for inflation, I believe this is a fair and balanced proposition that allows us both to gain a significant portion of the money.
Considering the inflation impact, I propose a 60/40 split in favor of Bob. This aims to balance the diminishing value of money while ensuring a reasonable gain for both parties.
